TopicTitle: Terminate/Discover More than One Debris at a time.

Articles.Content: I'm making a ksp war movie and I've been practicing and recording and there is 83 debris I have to point and click and terminate or recover to stop lagging, so then I thought... What if you could recover/terminate more than one debris at a time, Like you'd delete those pointless junk emails in your email?

There's a slider in settings that limits the number of "debris" vessels that are tracked in the game at any given time. It's set by default to some absurd value like 200. I slide mine down to ~ 25 for the exact same reason.

If you slide it down to a low value it should solve your problem.

Have you tried turning it down to 0 and then turning it back up again? You may need to go to the tracking station in between but I believe this works...
